string.text: Do I need a test case?
Here's a test case for beta.
I will find it.
Don't.
Good \n
I completed the quest
Excellent \n
Where is my reward
There she is
Thank you.
Thank you.
What's new?

A new group of researchers has appeared in the zone, collecting artifacts throughout the zone. Well, like artifacts, every garbage, none of the stalkers would even covet this, but they are looking. Interested?
How do I find them?
Not interested.
They are scattered throughout the zone. One, they say, was seen recently in the swamps. He took some measurements in the church.
What are you doing here?
Our research team is working on the theory of the origin of artifacts. I am here alone, we split up to cover as many territories as possible. Will you help me?
More details.
I don't have time for this.
We need to bypass some anomalies and collect some radioactive dirt for me. I want to warn you right away, these are almost formed artifacts, so you will need a detector to search.
I am an experienced stalker and have everything I need.
Would love to help, but I don't have an artifact detector. Maybe you can lend me yours?
Very good.
Well, I can give you my old detector, but it is quite effective in experienced hands. Although, in future, if you get a chance to obtain better device, do not hesitate.
I'm on a mission.
How are the searches progressing?
I am still on my assignment.
I could not find the samples you are looking for.
Are you giving up on the assignment?
Yes.
No. I'll keep looking.
Sorry. This is a major setback that will greatly affect our research.
Okay, tell me what you got there.
Find artifacts here in the swamps and bring them to me.
I brought you your dirt, where is my money?
Oh that's great, please get your bonus.
What's next?

I measured anomalies at Agroprom and found a number of strange abnormalities. Artifacts that form in these anomalies have a unique modulation characteristic only for this place. The situation at Agroprom is tense and I had to flee. In the confusion, I left my laptop with data. Find my laptop, it will show the coordinates of the artifacts I'm interested in.
Here. Found a PDA with data and artifacts.
Thank you, you are a true friend of science!
I'm listening.
Why don't you ask your colleagues from Amber?
I work separately from the scientific group at Yantar. These mediocrities have not yet investigated the nearest anomalies. Find these artifacts and I'll pay you well.
Here are your samples.
Great job young man.
Do you have more tasks?
Strange fluctuations have been found in the neighboring area called the Wild. It looks like there are formations of interest to us that are worth exploring.
I found them.
Great.
Let's go for something more dangerous.

I didn't mean to entrust you with this task, but I can't wait. The research plan must be carried out. There used to be a secret laboratory on the territory of Amber. Psi radiation is incredibly high here, which could not but affect the characteristics of the local samples. We need to prepare for this outing.
It wasn't easy, but I put it all together.
Great, that's enough for a while.
Problems?
Yes, this area is teeming with mutants and bandits, and these idiots sent me here alone. How do they imagine that I can cope with my task.
What is the task?
There are some pretty tough anomalies here. Practically untouched. We need to get samples from them.
It wasn't easy.
But you did it.
Anything else?
The vehicle graveyard is a little-explored area, many shun it, although there are a number of curious anomalies. Find artifacts there and bring them to me, I will pay well for them.
An easy walk.
Thank you.
What's next?
As you can see, without helpers I feel like no hands. I sent one stalker to the junkyard to place prototypes in the anomalies. But he disappeared somewhere.
This is not surprising in these places.
My assistant placed two prototypes in the anomalies and then disappeared. Find his PDA, there should be indicated the anomalies we need and then take test samples.
Bandits killed your messenger, but I was able to find your samples.
And that's good.
I have come to help you with your research.
Commendable zeal, I hope you're not applying for my PhD?
For now, I'm only interested in money.
Here in the military depots, there are many interesting anomalies that the armed groups bypass. I need samples of these.
I have collected artifacts.
Great.
How do you know where the artifacts you need will be?

Our research group is part of the Research Institute of ChAZ. We are studying the area to find a way to destroy it, or at least control it. We learned a lot thanks to the information received from the Strelka, including the map of the location of the anomalies.
So that's who marked the anomalies on the map.

In the Red Forest, there are several anomalies of interest to us, the exact coordinates of Strelok dropped along with the PDA in the tunnels. Find the PDA first, and then the artifacts we are interested in.
I found anomalies listed in the PDA.
Here is your reward.
Are there any other artifacts you need?

Work on the creation of artificial artifacts was carried out even before the disaster. My supervisor used to live and work in Limansk. We stayed at his house for a long time, discussing scientific work. And if my memory serves me right, then I saw something resembling an artifact even then.
What happened to your friend?
I don't know, there was no evacuation from Limansk. Where its inhabitants disappeared is unknown. But I remember the address of his house. Maybe you should check if the artifact is still there?
Limansk is in a terrible state. There are no residents there, but I managed to find the artifact.
It can't be.
Where are we?
An interesting pattern. Indisputable proof that artifacts can be obtained by artificial means.
Is it possible, how artifacts could have appeared before the zone appeared?

Ever heard of artifact farms? Research in this direction has been going on for a long time. The X-19 laboratory was engaged in this, now destroyed. And the "beds" for her served as a dead forest. The territory is dangerous. But we need any information. I think it's worth looking for the remains of the technical documentation at the entrance to the laboratory. Maybe there are artifacts left on the beds. Also worth checking out.
Just as you said. Documentation and artifact.
Great. Don't ask how I knew it would be there. Here is your reward. I hope for your silence.
Anything else?
A large group of mercenaries controls the territory of the Dead City. Abnormal activity there is relatively weak, but we need artifacts from there too.
Nice town and hospitable people.
I'm glad you like it.
I'm ready.
I will mark the anomalies that interest me. Can you get the artifacts out of there?
I completed your assignment.
Here's the reward, as promised.
What else?

New data is coming in. We do not know everything about the zone. Many anomalies have not yet been mapped. I will mark the approximate coordinates of their dislocations. But be careful, there is a reason why they are not in the general database.
Here are some samples.
Great.
Do you have more tasks?
Now I want to send you to the most dangerous area of the zone - Pripyat. I have marked the anomalies of interest on the map.
Job completed.
I hope it was worth it.
What's up with the assignment?

The backwater is poorly explored. Calculations show that these places should contain artifacts of interest. In order to pinpoint the anomalies that need to be investigated, I restored the equipment at the Krug sounding station. It took time to scan, and it was dangerous to stay, so I'm here. To start our research, you need to enter the station and pick up the memory module. All the necessary data is there. By the way, there are several anomalies nearby, perhaps they contain the necessary samples, but it will be possible to say for sure only after receiving the scan data.
Easy walk. I removed the data, found the artifacts.
Great.
Another task?
The following anomalies are well known but very dangerous. Be careful on the bridge.
Check it out.
Just right.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
I don't. But here, on the territory of the Zone, there is another colleague of mine who is also engaged in scientific research. I will send you to him.

Thanks for the invaluable help. I still need to do some calculations. And you move to the north of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. The head of our group, Academician Skabinsky, is already there. I have no idea what he had to go through to get there. Hurry, he needs your help.

Our calculations are full of holes due to lack of information, but approximately we were able to establish the place where the anomaly is located, which is knocked out of the calculations. Now our head Academician Skabinsky is examining it. He wanted to tell you something, I think you should hurry, the place is dangerous. He shouldn't have gone there alone.
Hello stalker.
Hello.
Hello brother.
How are you?
God, you found me. Are you ready to infiltrate the giga anomaly? Go deeper into it, get into its dangerous center?
Maybe.
Probably not.
Getting there is extremely difficult. Take this advanced detector here, it shows the location of the anomalies. This will give you a better chance of achieving success.
Thank you.
Do you hear? The zone is calling us. Move out. Go and take her gift. I will wait for you on the Zaton.
Thank you.
I found an artifact on generators.
Thanks, stalker. Science owes you an invaluable debt. You deserve a worthy reward. Quickly bring the artifact here.
Sure, take it bro.
Uh, no. Such an artifact will be useful to me myself.
You forget, we had a contract. We will not tolerate breaking it!
Okay, okay, here's your artifact.
With this artifact, I am practically invulnerable. You can't do anything to me!
Hold on, nit.

Thank you. Even though our paths diverge here, we will always remember you. No amount of money can evaluate your contribution to science, but this modest amount, I think, will not be superfluous. I advise you to immediately sit down for a dissertation, your experience in the study of anomalies is simply invaluable. I hope our paths will still cross, I will recommend you for admission to our institute. Thanks again. Good luck, stalker.
I found you, how is your search progressing?

Well hello. Is that you, the stalker who helped our group in research? It seems in vain we hoped for your help, the calculations are wrong, this damn place is not the center of the zone. It was all in vain.
Is there nothing more to be done?
Everything you could, you have already done. Now get out. The failure of our operation is your merit.
Any special assignments?
You want to take on a real case, fighter? I hope I'm strong enough, so let's see... here's a list of priority targets for the Joint Chiefs of Staff:
To retrieve documents from the dungeons of Agroprom.

It has come to our attention that there are highly classified documents in the underground complex of the Research Institute, which contain important information regarding the experiments that were conducted in this institute, where we are currently based. Your goal: to get these documents, and how you do it - I do not care. Will you do it?
I'm taking the case.
I'm not ready to take the job yet.
To retrieve documents from the X-18 lab complex.

This lab contains vital information about the development of the Caymanov Experimental Emitter. Your objective: to retrieve the documentation regarding this research and bring it here to headquarters. Upon your return, you will be rewarded handsomely.
You're sending me to my death, Comrade Colonel? There's all kinds of evil out there... All right, I'll do it.
I'm not so stupid as to go to the Burer's for lunch. I think I'll pass.
Get the documents from the X-16 lab.

We need to get scientific documentation of the research that was done in that lab. As far as I know, it was X-16 that sent the finished units for the psi unit. The task is not an easy one: you have to break through the radiation into the underground laboratory complex and find the surviving documentation. Data on the enemies you will encounter: zombified, mutants, the expected number of 50-100. First, try to find a mobile camp of scientists on Yantar and ask the scientific personnel better about this laboratory, I am sure you should be able to get help with psi-protection, which is necessary to break into the underground complex. So, will you do it?
I'll take it. It'll be done.
I'm not trained enough for an operation like this. I won't take it just yet.
Get the documents from the X-10 lab.

Your task: to break through the Radar to the complex "Brain Burner", to destroy all the monoliths that you will meet on the way, to penetrate the underground laboratory, turn off the transmitter, to find all the remaining documentation. So, you ready to head north?
I'm ready to go through the Burner. I'll take the mission.
I'm not ready to go out there yet. I won't be taking it just yet.
Get the documents from the X-8 lab.

On the outskirts of Pripyat there is a top-secret laboratory X-8, your task: to get out of there all the surviving documentation of the research that was conducted there. The laboratory is under the building of the former house of life "Jubilee". Are you ready for your assignment?
It'll be done.
No, I need to prepare.
Obtain documents from the Pripyat Dungeons.

Our command knows that under Pripyat there are huge communications, so to speak "city under the city", a secret object, codenamed "Pripyat-1 Pipeline". Headquarters wants to know what experiments, developments, research were conducted there. Your goal: to find all the secret documentation.
Will do.
I need to prepare.
Destroy the Monolith control room and retrieve the documents.
I changed my mind.

There have been many attempts to storm Chernobyl and seize the damn control room... but they all failed miserably. Anyway, it has to be done. Your goal: destroy the control room and get all the information you can find. Before you go, find a hermit on the Everglades, a Swamp Doctor who has information about the decoder needed to break the door that leads to the control room.
I will find this Swamp Doctor and destroy the Monolith lab.
I don't feel strong enough to do such a feat... I need to prepare myself.
Mission accomplished, Comrade Colonel! Here are the documents from the subway research institute.
The task was completed perfectly, you're alive, we've got the documents. Here's your well-deserved reward!
Mission accomplished, I got the necessary documents from X-18.
Well done, soldier! This is extremely important information for the command. Such a case should not go without a reward, keep the deserved!
Good day, Comrade Colonel! I've got the documents from X-16 in my hands, the psi-set on Yantar is disabled.

Well done! That's quite a feat! Now I hope we'll be able to send a SWAT team to seize the entire complex and ensure the safe operation of scientific groups in that area. Here you go, more than earned it:
The operation was a success: the "Burner" is disabled, and here are the documents I managed to find in the X-10 itself.
The road to the North is now open again, there is now a better chance to gain control of the Zone... all thanks to you. You're the best fighter I've ever met. Take this as a reward:
I'm back from Pripyat, the lab was found under the former KBO "Jubilee", here are the documents from the lab itself.
Great work! This will shed light on many mysteries of the Zone, the command will be pleased with your work, and here is a reward:
Mission accomplished, commander! Here's the important documentation from the Pripyat-1 Pipeline.

The task was completed successfully... I'm amazed, the soldiers here have been following your example for a long time, I look at you and think: a general's shoulder straps would suit you, here, take it, it's not a general's shoulder straps, but it's a good increase in salary:

I'm back from Chernobyl. The system of controlling the Monolith was destroyed, as it turned out that the Sarcophagus was an illusion, which was created from the control bunker; here are documents, they describe it in detail.

It can not be! I was beginning to think that I sent you to the slaughter, it's ... me, I'm speechless! I immediately radio the command that the Monolith was a crushing blow, and all the secret information we have in hand! Now only the higher authorities will decide when the next operation to seize the Center, but thanks to you, for the first time we have a chance to take control of the Zone and throw out of its territory mutants and stalkers! Please accept my sincere congratulations! You are a hero without exaggeration! Here, this is for you, the high command however believed in you and asked to give you deserved honors and reward, by right now is yours!
Greetings, I have come to help.

Nice to meet a friendly face, I hope the battle at the nuclear plant went well? I'm Sergeant Lucky, let's get acquainted, but you can just call me Vasil. To the point, the monoliths are sitting on a base southeast of this glowing thing in the middle of the forest. There are mines all around, and on the towers there are snipers. All right, we're moving out, try to get these motherfuckers before they see us.
Come on, sergeant, I'll cover.
Comrade Captain, I'm ready to take part in the assault.

All right. These bastards are holding three roadblocks: two of them on the approaches to the sarcophagus, one right in front of Unit 4. Two of our squads will launch an assault from both sides. Your job is to support our guys with fire and shoot as many of those damn monoliths as possible.
Roger that! I'm going in.
You know where we can get some tools around here?
I heard something, just give me some money, like 2,000.
Here you go.
I'll come back later.
I know, and for 4,000 I'll tell you.
Here, take it.
Thank you, I don't need it.
But you pay me some money, like 1000, then I'll tell you.
Here's your money.
I changed my mind.
2,500 and no less. Then we'll talk.
Here.
Money's tight.
Listen here, friend:
[furthermore...]
I don't know.
Look in the hiding places.
Leave me alone, I can't deal with you right now.
You should look in the Dark Valley at the bandit base. They don't have much tech, so you can borrow an extra set. But where exactly - I was not outlined.
At the dump look for the guys recently told me that they have something like a base in the local hangar. Rather, for rough work there and will be found.
Cordon, ATP. Wanted there gangsters extensive base zabahat, even a technician with the equipment brought, but he disappeared somewhere, but his stuff they say remained.

At the cordon, within the Southern checkpoint look for. I hope you know how to work with a map? Dangerous there, no one goes there, so it is possible that the tools are there for fine work. And there are some other trustworthy reasons for that.

In Agroprom, where the complex is central. There's also an anomaly with electrons and psi, you know? It's somewhere in that complex that's worth looking for. There is no time for people to gather all sorts of junk now, the point is strategic and the fight for it is constantly going on, but to see - saw all sorts of technical junk.

The cemetery of technology. That's right now go out of the bar and look for a car with the number "9941KIL", it will lead you to the cherished box. I heard from a Debtor, they were on a raid there, on reconnaissance in general. Well, they combed the area, and there snork - dark. Well, they conducted a "tactical retreat", hehe. One here is running away and noticed the cherished machine.

You to Agroprom, where the main military base. Too cool? And what can you do, but they are on the state support and technology they have "fat", not like ours, from a turd at least build a tank. You didn't think you could get calibration tools so easily, did you?
Thanks for the money, now piss off, I don't know where your tools are, you fucking crank.
No, I'm sorry, man, I forgot that place. Look in the stash houses, ask around the dealers.
Any special assignments?

No special assignments yet, but I got a job to do. We need to pick up the scanner from the archianomaly, which is south of the west tower, it should by this time to do all the measurements of anomalous activity. You up for it?
Some other time.
I'll do it.
Here's the device. You can have it.
Thank you. By the way, there's a scout coming in tonight, where around 8:00-22:00 p.m. You just stay right there. We'll meet him.
Is there anything I can do for Clear Skies?

Yeah. You know, even though we've regained a little control of the Swamps, our numbers leave a lot to be desired. Abnormal activity is down a lot, so we've got bandits, renegades and shit all over the place... so we're giving up position after position. That is why we are literally locked in the starting points, no rest from the Renegades, I was told that they are preparing another attack on our outpost at the pumping station, help our guys fight back.
Another time.
I'll do it.
The Renegades have been destroyed...

All right! I've prepared an assault team to take the South Village, and we need to secure the road to the Cordon. Move into position and help our group. You can go with them, the guys are on their way out of the base.
The cordon road is under control.

Good job, we've secured the main positions, thank you for your help. Here's your reward, but, we've got another problem. It's the military. Previously, the soldiers with their presence drove away the renegades and other trash, they did not touch us, and we accordingly them, but, now the marshes are sending more and more squads of military stalkers, we are suffering losses, I think it's time to end it. Their base in the mechanized yard, knocking them out from there, we will have an advantage and finally get a foothold here, we can not delay, I'm sending assault group of the most experienced fighters, they are already coming from the base, join them and provide support to the fight.
The military is knocked out of the mechanized yard, it was a tough fight.

Thank you, with your help we have regained our key places and are again a force to be reckoned with, eh, if Lebedev were here... Okay, enough of the sentimentality, we have a lot of work to do going forward, here's your reward and thanks again.
The scout is dead. Here's his PDA.
It's a shame about him, of course. He was one of the best. Thank you.
I'm here about the decrypted PDA.

We have some good news, have a seat. Crutch managed to find out that some of our missing comrades from 2011 survived! Judging by the information from the DA, a mercenary named Scar, who in 2011 was making his way with our assault squads through Limansk and Hospital to NCPP in order to catch up with him and stop the shooter survived, we also know that he was in contact with some stalkers, whose description is similar to the members of Lebedev's group. Our scout claims that the information is not false. Stalker, make inquiries about Scar from those who deal with neutrals and find him. Perhaps we can reunite with our comrades. The best thing would be to go straight to Sidorovitch.
Yes, that's great news. Perhaps Sidorovich knows this stalker. I'll ask him and find surviving comrades.
I found one surviving member of Clear Skies.
You found him? Who is he? Where is he?

That's Gamayun, one of Lebedev's group. He's currently fighting with the Outcasts of the Monolith. Unfortunately, he refused to return to the Swamps with me. He says he won't leave his brothers behind.

Well, he knows better. If he survived, perhaps others did. Your story gives me hope. Perhaps one day we will be reunited with our comrades. Also, I will have our intelligence units assist the outcasts. Oh, yeah, I think you deserve a reward.
Thank you. (chuckles)
Greetings, are you the Scar? I need some information.
That's the one. Who the hell are you? Not now, help me fight off a pack of pseudo-dogs. They've been chasing me for two kilometers.
It's okay, we can fight them off together.
Oh, we did it. Please tell me about the surviving members of Lebedev's group. According to my information, you know something.

Yes, I do know something. But I won't tell you much, I know only rumors. Have you heard about the Strider and his group? They are all former monoliths, but now they have rebelled against the masters of the Zone and are guerrilla warfare with the "Monolith". Rumor has it that among these monolith outcasts are members of Clear Sky. His unit is located in the vicinity of "Jupiter", in the former territory of the army checkpoint, there used to hang out the leader of a local gang of bandits, nicknamed Valet, until he was shot in the temple.
Thank you very much.
I found the Gamayun posse, and he told me to give you this device. The squad did their job.
Well, this device will turn the tide in our favour. I'm glad you found your comrade. It's a shame to lose such a fighter.
He's decided to stay with the Outcasts.
Good. I think you deserve a reward for helping our group. We're not rich, but we have something. There you go.
Thank you.
I hear you have some former CS'es in your ranks, can I see them? I work for Clear Skies and we're looking for our comrades.
Hmm... We do have CS'es in our ranks. They were monoliths like the rest of us, until the O-Consciousness loosened its grip. Now we stand together against the Monolith.
So where can I meet them?

I'm afraid you're too late. Their unit's gone on a mission to eastern Pripyat. Unfortunately, they haven't made contact yet. If you hurry, you can catch up with them. I don't have many men, so I don't have anyone to send to their rescue.
Thank you for the information. I'll be sure to find them and help them if they're in danger.
Looks like I got here just in time.
Yeah, well... Those fanatics would've killed us if we'd been any closer. Did the Strider send you?
I'm actually looking for you. You're a member of Lebedev's group, aren't you? "Clear Skies is looking for you.

Hmm... I used to be. But now I'm an Outcast of the Monolith. I'll tell you everything and we'll decide what to do next, but now help me complete my task while you're here. The Monoliths were tougher than we thought. I've sent a unit to the river port to seize a device that can be used to bug fanatics, but they didn't respond. Seems like the Monolith captured them. Recon the territory and help us capture this device.
All right, I'll help.
Here's the device.
Thank you, you'd better give it to the Strider. I'll stay here, and we'll secure this outpost with my boys.
So you're not coming to the Swamp with me?

No. I'm sorry, but I'm an outcast. I can't leave my brothers behind. By the way, I promised you I'd tell you my story, so listen. In 2011, I was with Lebedev as part of an assault group breaking through Limansk. Our boss and some guys and some mercenaries moved further north, and I established myself in the city. Then there was that ejection, after which I lost my memory. According to Strider, I served the Monolith like all of them. After the events of 2012 I was myself again, waking up somewhere in the vicinity of Jupiter. I managed to survive thanks to Strider, and I became a member of his group.
Thank you for your story. I'll pass the device on to Strider, and I'll say hello to Cold from you.
Is there a special job?

Come to think of it, yes. There's a war going on with the Freedom and the bandits, plus there's fanatics coming from the north. All our forces are at war, and we need hunters for our main task - to destroy the Zone. I'm offering you a job as a witch doctor. It's as simple as that: I offer you a "witch" contract, and you fulfill it and get a reward for it. How's that sound?
Sounds good. If the pay is decent, I'll take it. What's my first contract?

Don't worry about the pay, we'll pay you in money and good equipment if you prove yourself. Your first contract will be to destroy a den of bloodsuckers that have migrated south. It's a pretty big pain in the ass, the bloodsuckers have gotten past all our posts and patrols. Destroy these critters and come back for your reward. I suggest you start your search for the lair with the Butcher, he's the leader of the local hunters.
I'll take that contract. Consider these bloodsuckers already dead.
Mission accomplished, bloodsuckers destroyed.
Good job, here's your reward.
prinesi_military_docs_start_0
prinesi_military_docs_start_1
prinesi_military_docs_start_21
prinesi_military_docs_start_22
prinesi_military_docs_start_31
prinesi_military_docs_done_0
prinesi_military_docs_done_1
I'm looking for a certain mercenary named Scar. You know him?
Maybe I do, but what do you need him for?
He's got important information that's important to Clear Skies.
I can sell you some information, but it'll cost you 20,000 bucks + some favors. Do some special assignment, as a sign that I can trust you, and we'll see what we know about Scar.
Okay, I'll run one of your errands and buy the information.
I don't have time for these games.
Then stop bugging me and get out of here.
It's about Scar's information.
You got the money? Did you finish my assignment?
Not yet.
Yeah, here's the money. I did my job.

Well, anyway, listen, or better yet, write it down on a piece of paper, heh-heh. This mercenary came to see me. He needed some equipment for a deep raid into the northern territories. He's a pretty generous guy, spent a lot of money. From what he told me, I understand he's looking for something on Zaton. I think that's where he is now. There's also a rumor that he's holed up in the substation shops, collecting some junk. All right, good luck finding him.
Thanks for the info.
